invite.Title: Invite Server
invite.Body:
Use this link below to add PokeTrainer to another discord server!

[Invite PokeTrainer](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1151657435073875988&permissions=395674216512&scope=bot)

register.Title: Register Error
register.Body: There was an error while registering your server with PokeTrainer. Please try again or contact us in the [Discord]({0}).

register.Title: Server Registered

server.Title: Server Details

unregister.Title: Server Unregistered
unregister.Body:
Announcements will now be stop being sent to your server. To begin again, use the **/register** command.

Users may still interact with PokeTrainer while it is present in the server.
